ability_1_desc: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
ability_2_desc: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

ability_1_desc: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3X their power, but prevents their extra effects.
ability_2_desc: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

ability_1_desc: Lets the Pokemon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokemon.
ability_2_desc: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.
